Package ohos.data.search.schema

Class EmailItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.search.model.IndexData
      • ohos.data.search.schema.Schema<EmailItem>
        • ohos.data.search.schema.EmailItem

  • public final class EmailItem
extends Schema<EmailItem>
    Represents the index schema for email items.

    This schema is used to create indexes for email items. It supports index fields bccEmail, ccEmail, toEmail, senderEmail, bccName, ccName, toName, senderName, content, attachment, and all the fields in CommonItem. Among these fields, identifier is mandatory and can be set via the CommonItem#setIdentifier(String) method.

    Since:
    5
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_SEARCH
